Package LDtk

package LDtk
  • Class
    Description
    AllowedRefs
    Possible values: `Any`, `OnlySame`, `OnlyTags`, `OnlySpecificEntity`
    AutoLayerRuleDefinition
    This complex section isn't meant to be used by game devs at all, as these rules are completely resolved internally by the editor before any saving.
    AutoLayerRuleGroup
     
    BgPos
     
    Checker
    Checker mode Possible values: `None`, `Horizontal`, `Vertical`
    Converter
     
    Definitions
    If you're writing your own LDtk importer, you should probably just ignore *most* stuff in the `defs` section, as it contains data that are mostly important to the editor.
    EditorDisplayMode
    Possible values: `Hidden`, `ValueOnly`, `NameAndValue`, `EntityTile`, `LevelTile`, `Points`, `PointStar`, `PointPath`, `PointPathLoop`, `RadiusPx`, `RadiusGrid`, `ArrayCountWithLabel`, `ArrayCountNoLabel`, `RefLinkBetweenPivots`, `RefLinkBetweenCenters`
    EditorDisplayPos
    Possible values: `Above`, `Center`, `Beneath`
    EditorLinkStyle
    Possible values: `ZigZag`, `StraightArrow`, `CurvedArrow`, `ArrowsLine`, `DashedLine`
    EmbedAtlas
     
    EntityDefinition
     
    EntityInstance
     
    EnumDefinition
     
    EnumTagValue
    In a tileset definition, enum based tag infos
    EnumValueDefinition
     
    FieldDefinition
    This section is mostly only intended for the LDtk editor app itself.
    FieldInstance
     
    Flag
     
    ForcedRefs
    This object is not actually used by LDtk.
    GridPoint
    This object is just a grid-based coordinate used in Field values.
    IdentifierStyle
    Naming convention for Identifiers (first-letter uppercase, full uppercase etc.) Possible values: `Capitalize`, `Uppercase`, `Lowercase`, `Free`
    ImageExportMode
    "Image export" option when saving project.
    IntGridValueDefinition
    IntGrid value definition
    IntGridValueInstance
    IntGrid value instance
    LayerDefinition
     
    LayerInstance
     
    LDtk
    This file is a JSON schema of files created by LDtk level editor (https://ldtk.io).
    LdtkCustomCommand
     
    LdtkTableOfContentEntry
     
    Level
    This section contains all the level data.
    LevelBackgroundPosition
    Level background image position info
    LimitBehavior
    Possible values: `DiscardOldOnes`, `PreventAdding`, `MoveLastOne`
    LimitScope
    If TRUE, the maxCount is a "per world" limit, if FALSE, it's a "per level".
    NeighbourLevel
    Nearby level info
    ReferenceToAnEntityInstance
    This object describes the "location" of an Entity instance in the project worlds.
    RenderMode
    Possible values: `Rectangle`, `Ellipse`, `Tile`, `Cross`
    TextLanguageMode
     
    TileCustomMetadata
    In a tileset definition, user defined meta-data of a tile.
    TileInstance
    This structure represents a single tile from a given Tileset.
    TileMode
    Defines how tileIds array is used Possible values: `Single`, `Stamp`
    TileRenderMode
    An enum describing how the the Entity tile is rendered inside the Entity bounds.
    TilesetDefinition
    The `Tileset` definition is the most important part among project definitions.
    TilesetRectangle
    This object represents a custom sub rectangle in a Tileset image.
    Type
    Type of the layer as Haxe Enum Possible values: `IntGrid`, `Entities`, `Tiles`, `AutoLayer`
    When
    Possible values: `Manual`, `AfterLoad`, `BeforeSave`, `AfterSave`
    World
    **IMPORTANT**: this type is available as a preview.
    WorldLayout
